about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of "Empire Chronicles," a sprawling and intricate world filled with adventure, danger, and excitement. Are you ready to embark on a journey that will test your skills, your wits, and your courage? With over 100 hours of gameplay in the main story alone, "Empire Chronicles" is an experience that will keep you engaged and enthralled for days on end.

Take part in the mortal plane's final stand against the forces of evil. Will you be one of the heroes of destiny or just a footnote in another chapter of lost causes?

Will you help protect the empire's long, proud heritage or uncover their deep, dark secrets?

Explore a massive world filled with secrets, hidden treasures, and challenging enemies. With 18 main playable characters, each with their own character arc, you'll discover new depths to the story with each playthrough. And with a deep and emotional main story, you'll be drawn into the world like never before.



With a complex stats and combat system, you'll have to hone your skills and spend perk points strategically to take on the toughest enemies. And with a massive skill tree featuring hundreds of skills, you'll have endless possibilities for customizing your characters and building the ultimate team.

Every battle is a unique and strategic experience, thanks to our new and innovative battle system. And with loads of side quests and secrets to discover, there's always something new to explore and uncover, and with timing events, day-night cycle, and weather patterns, you'll have to use all your skills and knowledge to survive in this dangerous world.

And for those who want an even greater challenge, "Empire Chronicles" offers multiple difficulties with greater risk and reward. So whether you're a seasoned adventurer or a newcomer to the world of RPGs, "Empire Chronicles" has something for everyone.

Get ready for an adventure like no other. Get "Empire Chronicles" today and discover a world filled with wonder, danger, and excitement.

If you're interested in Empire Chronicles, please wishlist and follow us :)

Main Features


- Sprawling and Large World.
- Epic storyline and Narrative.
- Complex Stats & Combat.
- Massive Skill Trees With Hundreds Of Skills.
- 100+ hours in the main story
- New, unique, and strategic battle system
- Deep and emotional main story
- Loads of side quests and secrets to discover
- 18 main playable characters each with character arcs.
- Tons of equipment to build your team for a wide variety of enemies

Sub Features


- Craft all assortments of weapons, trinkets, armor, edibles and furniture.
- Hone skills & spend perk points.
- Timing events, day night cycle, and weather patterns.
- Multiple Difficulties: With greater risk & reward.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: WindowsR 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or better.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Intergrated Sound
  • Additional Notes: PIXEL SHADER: 3.0. VERTEX SHADER: 3.0
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: Turn Based Strategy RPG. With complex skills, sprawling world and intricate storyline.
